content: last ch3 space finish off the 1st corner in 1st ch3 space make 1dc finish with a slip_stitch join in 3rd chain of beg chain 5 or for a neater look finish with a sewn bind off in the 4th chain 3 x 2dc clusters on each side 4 x ch2 corner sps round 3 join colour c in any ch2 corner space but preferable not the one you ve ended round 2 on ch5 counts as 1dc & a ch2 space 3dc in same space 2dc between 2dc clusters from prev round twice in ch2 space make a corner 3dc ch2 3dc 3 times 2dc between 2dc clusters from prev round twice finish off the 1st corner in 1st ch3 space make 2dc finish with a slip_stitch join in 3rd chain of beg chain 5 or for a neater look finish with a sewn bind off in the 4th chain 2 x 2dc clusters on each side 4 x corners with 2x 3dc clusters & ch2 sps © merrian holland 2021 www mezzacraft com ♥ please do not share or copy this pattern in any format please do share the link to this pattern ♥ thank you ♥ p age 4 | 5 i hope you like my twinkling granny square pattern if you give it a try please let me know for border and joining ideas please visit my website www mezzacraft com my project i am using these squares to make a granny square jumper/sweater if you d like to see more keep an eye on my instagram and website to see how it turns out connect with me you can often find me on instagram please do follow and tag me @mezzamay if you make one of my patterns use one of my tips or stitch patterns i really love to see what you re making © merrian holland 2021 www mezzacraft com ♥ please do not share or copy this pattern in any format please do share the link to this pattern ♥ thank you ♥ p age 5 | 5
